name: Don't Look Down (itch) (Team Sparrow)
description:
Don't Look Down is a futuristic 2.5D platformer set in an abandoned facility full of traps. You play as a robot sphere controlled by a newly hired collector who is tasked with retrieving a precious artifact known as the "Power Gem".  The robot sphere comes equipped with various abilities such as gravity switch and dash, which allows the player to traverse through the various levels.   

Created By:

Benjamin Phommasone

Denzel Joaquin Tano

Kevin Van

Leo Yu
